articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S22 series price, storage details leaked: Here's how much it might cost - BGR India
articles.description: Samsung Galaxy S22 European prices leaked online likely to cost between €849 (roughly Rs 71600) and €1449 (around Rs 122300).
articles.content: Samsung Galaxy S22 series is set to launch next month and rumours around the premium handsets are flooding on the internet. While previous reports revealed the flagship lineup to have Snapdragon 8 Ge… [+2313 chars]

articles.title: ‘Danger zone’: EU slaps new travel restrictions on Australia - Sky News Australia
articles.description: The European Union has identified Australia as a "COVID danger zone” raising concerns Australian tourists could be banned from Europe or forced into quarantine.
articles.content: Australian travellers have been hit with new restrictions after the European Union advised member states to block visitors due to surging Omicron case numbers.The European Union has identified Austra… [+2905 chars]
